line_1: Let now your loud and threatning Notes relent.
line_2: But now, you Storms, that have your Fury spent,

line_1: Ambiguous looks, that scorn and yet relent,
line_2: Reluctant pride, and amorous faint consent,
" To pleasant Sin and joyous Dalliance bent;
" And think to scape deserved Punishment.
"Grace be to Those who can, and will, repent;

line_1: Lest thy soft nature should relent,
line_2: And Stella for her crime repent;

line_1: His Rage can in my Smiles alone relent;
line_2: And all his Joys solicit my Consent.
